docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: routes_to_solution(routes)
docs.text:
Converts a list of routes into a solution (list of routes).

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default routes list

List of routes, where each route is a list of nodes.

required

Returns:

Name Type Description list

Solution (list of routes).

Source code in routeml/utils.py 
def routes_to_solution(routes):
"""
    Converts a list of routes into a solution (list of routes).

    Args:
        routes (list): List of routes, where each route is a list of nodes.

    Returns:
        list: Solution (list of routes).
    """
    solution = []
    for i, route in enumerate(routes):
        assert route[0] == 0
        assert route[-1] == 0
        # Skip depot node for all routes except the first one
        if i > 0:
            route = route[1:]
        solution += route
    return solution

docs.title: solution_to_routes(solution)
docs.text:
Converts a solution (list of nodes) into a list of routes.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default solution list

Solution (list of nodes).

required

Returns:

Name Type Description list

List of routes, where each route is a list of nodes.

Source code in routeml/utils.py 
def solution_to_routes(solution):
"""
    Converts a solution (list of nodes) into a list of routes.

    Args:
        solution (list): Solution (list of nodes).

    Returns:
        list: List of routes, where each route is a list of nodes.
    """
    routes = []
    route = []
    for node in solution:
        if node == 0 and route:
            route.append(0)
            routes.append(route)
            route = []
        route.append(node)
    return routes
